venture off into your new project i must draw your attention to some important information do not copy this pattern translate it into other languages change reproduce resell or publish it without my permission don t publish parts of this pattern or any of the images used in it simply said don t steal this pattern or part of it and publish or sell it as your own i ve put in love and effort into creating this free pattern for everyone to enjoy so please respect my copyright as the creator thanks <3 contact e-mail wildflower-fibercrafts@protonmail com if you have any questions or concerns about this pattern feel free to contact me pattern by wildflower fibercrafts size to fit an 8 5cm/3 3 clasp depth about 7 4cm/3 deep from the clasp to the bottom gauge 6st x 8rnds = 1x1 stockinette in the round needles 3 5mm or any size needed to obtain gauge dpn s or whatever method you prefer for knitting in the round notions a metal coin pouch clasp these are the ones i use https //amzn eu/d/3050ye6 a sewing needle that can fit through the holes of your clasp yarn any fingering weight yarn held double about 30m/33 yards per strand or 60m/66yards in total or any fingering weight held with a strand of mohair about 30m/33 yards per strand about yarn choice the fingering weight yarn held double creates a sturdy fabric that holds its shape well resulting in a pouch that can withstand heavy items like coins it also creates a great base to add embroidery to the finished piece using fingering weight yarn with mohair creates an airier less stiff fabric with an elegant halo it makes a perfect pouch for those looking for a dainty dreamy look it s perfectly possible to use a single strand of dk weight yarn instead as well pattern by wildflower fibercrafts abbreviations k knit kfb knit front&back knit the stitch but leave it on the left needle then knit through the back loop of the same stitch again x everything written in brackets is knit as often as the number after the x states in total the number in the brackets at the end of each round shows the total stitch count on the needles after completing that round pattern by wildflower fibercrafts cottage coin pouch
